name: BGTask
desc: An abstract class representing a task that’s run while the app is in the background.

items.name: var identifier: String
items.desc: The string identifier of the task.

items.name: var expirationHandler: (() -> Void)?
items.desc: A handler called shortly before the task’s background time expires.

items.name: func setTaskCompleted(success: Bool)
items.desc: Informs the background task scheduler that the task is complete.
